item.title: What Florida Is Doing To Vaccine Mandates Is Sick
item.description: Florida’s move on vaccine mandates will lead to avoidable illnesses and deaths.

item.title: California Child Infected With H5N1 Bird Flu, Source Unknown
item.description: CDC reports a San Francisco child infected with H5N1 bird flu in December 2024; source unknown. Case highlights risk to general population.
